phrases: I thought he had fallen off the Serpentine Road earlier oni.
Be that as it may, it looks like he is a lot faster this time oni -
Well, with this many of us members here, I am not at all afraid of those Saiyans.
I cannot wait to see what kind of training Kami- sama puts us through.
Thanks to my eating that fruit, I have already come this far in a flash.
I wonder if this is Kaio- sama's residence.
Snake Princess- sama, we have a visitor.
For some reason, my heart is all a-flutter!
The Snake Princess- sama has not been this worked up
since Great King Yama- sama, has she?
It is been nearly five hundred years, I will bet.
Never mind that, Kaio- sama, teach me some martial arts.
How about instead, we dance the tango?
Surely we were destined to come together.
The tango is a lot like the dance we did at my wedding.
So this is Kaio-sama's martial arts technique.
This is a technique to get your opponent off their guard,
-Kaio- sama is a lot weaker than I thought...
This is the Snake Princess- sama,
who shone in the glory of victory at the Other World Beauty Contest!
A- at least have dinner before you go.
Okay, okay, you guys, quickly prepare something for dinner!
We will do whatever it takes to keep that man here!
After all, he is the kind of nice man we have not had for five hundred years.
I will not have him get away from us!
Snake Princess- sama, if I mix this sleeping potion in with the cooking,
it will bring on an irresistible urge to sleep,
he will doze off, and will not leave here!
Well, it is not a very elegant method, but what choice do we have?
We have foie gras, made from the bird of paradise,
saute of bear's paw, from Needle Mountain,
baked crocodile, taken from the River Sanzu, and mussels au gratin.
Help yourself to as much as you like.
I- if you like, help yourself to my serving as well.
Okay, then... I will take it...
I am full, I am full!
Well then, I guess I should go.
I are not got time to sleep.
I have got to go meet Kaio- sama and everything.
You are sure you put the sleeping stuff in, right?
We have a bath warmed up.
How about if you took a bath before going?
Yeah, maybe I am a little sweaty.
Maybe I should freshen up before I go.
It is a little bit hot, but it is okay.
This originally comes from the steam baths of hell.
He should be warmed clear through to the bone!
Goku- sama, there are so many stars.
To think that I should be together with you on such a wonderful evening, Goku- sama,
it makes the Snake Princess so happy...
But still, what a manly figure he has.
Okay then, I will be going.
I have to hurry and see Kaio- sama, and learn martial arts from him!
In that case, then we have just the thing!
A thrilling, spine-tingling game of Russian Roulette!
You can help train your mind to overcome fear with this!
How does it train your mind?
First, you take one bullet and place it into the pistol.
Then you spin it round and round.
The chances of the bullet being shot are one in six.
When it does, that is the end of the story.
It is a game brimming with thrills, in exchange for one's life!
That ended all too easily, huh?
I are not doing anything that dangerous.
Yes, yes, please leave after you have watched this show!
It is a new martial art.
this time I made sure to use all the sleeping potion we had left.
Here, have some specially prepared juice.
For this guy to have eaten and drank that much sleeping potion and still be alive -
He should be asleep for three days and nights like this!
But you know, he has such a lovely face when he is asleep.
He is having some kind of dream.
This will reflect whatever dream he is having.
Ah, apparently they are his wife and child.
Are you going to eat this one too?
I wonder if there will be any for us this time.
After all, the only one to get out of here safely has been Great King Yama.
Once you have finished doing those drills, your studyin' is done for today.
I want to hurry up and go out and play.
Oh, it was a dream, was it?
He is awake already, is not he?
I was on my way to see Kaio- sama!
Everyone on earth is waiting for me to come back.
You are going, no matter what?
I am the Serpentine Road Goddess,
who has lived on the Serpentine Road for a thousand and five hundred years!
How dare you bring disgrace upon me!
You will never return home from here!
If you cannot realize my charms, then you can just dissolve away!
I have got to get out of here quick!
She did feed me all that food, after all.
I have to hurry and go see Kaio- sama!
If you want to live, you will have to defeat me!
The journey to Kaio-sama is still far.
The Saiyans' assault is drawing near.
Run the length of the Serpentine Road!
